attributes.action: give better guidance to independent tutor companies and teachers on chemistry lessons for immigrants and overseas recruitment - please answer should we really be teaching science universally ?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Healthcare and education public sectors should work for peace, the eradication of poverty, alleviation of human suffering, promotion of ethico - legal
principles and building on the body of scientific body of knowledge. Great as an ideal, but practical anomolies remain - the petitioner is calling on the P.M. to offer greater guidance on this day - to - day issue - please give the professions greater reasurance on how to ensure that their students only use British education to obtain legitimate qualifications and their skills are only put to legal use.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
